alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:06PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BAYFIELD, EASTERN DOUGLAS AND NORTHWESTERN ASHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 406 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Herbster, to 6 miles south of Barnes, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Herbster around 410 PM CDT. Cornucopia around 425 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Drummond, Washburn, Bayfield, La Pointe and Red Cliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
